name: Hop Shot Bravo
description:
Welcome to the world of Hop Hop Shot! (Free and Best new game)

Tap and jump your animal from one point to another as far as you can go and make sure to hop hop hop without plunging into the water.

Endless journey!

Try the game and see how far can you go to compete with your friends in leader board?

Game Features:
- Ranking online
- Simple and addictive gameplay
- Lovely Graphics
